verses.name: 1 Chronicles 19:7
verses.text: So they hired thirty and two thousand chariots, and the king of Maachah and his people; who came and pitched before Medeba. And the children of Ammon gathered themselves together from their cities, and came to battle.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 19:8
verses.text: And when David heard of it, he sent Joab, and all the host of the mighty men.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 19:9
verses.text: And the children of Ammon came out, and put the battle in array before the gate of the city: and the kings that were come were by themselves in the field.
